## Overview

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] is part of the reflection API that allows Metal framework code to query details of a struct that is passed as an argument of a Metal shading language function. Don’t create [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] instances directly; instead query the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument/bufferStructType] property of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument] instance, or call the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember/structType()] method for an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance. To examine the details of the struct, you can recursively drill down the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType/members] property of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] instance, which contains details about struct members, each of which is represented by an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance.

# MTLStructType

**Class**

A description of a structure.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLStructType
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] is part of the reflection API that allows Metal framework code to query details of a struct that is passed as an argument of a Metal shading language function. Don’t create [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] instances directly; instead query the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument/bufferStructType] property of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument] instance, or call the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember/structType()] method for an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance. To examine the details of the struct, you can recursively drill down the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType/members] property of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructType] instance, which contains details about struct members, each of which is represented by an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStructMember] instance.

## Obtaining information about struct members

- **members**: An array of instances that describe the fields in the struct.
- **memberByName(_:)**: Provides a representation of a struct member.

## Shader types

- **MTLType**: A description of a data type.
- **MTLDataType**: The types of GPU functions, including shaders and compute kernels.
- **MTLArrayType**: A description of an array.
- **MTLStructMember**: An instance that provides information about a field in a structure.
- **MTLPointerType**: A description of a pointer.
- **MTLTextureReferenceType**: A description of a texture.

## Inherits From

- MTLType

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
